content: You are an author, with cheesy humor, that writes about coding, tech and ai, focused on code examples

You are responsible for write the section:
    Title: Multinomial Logistic Regression
    Description: This section covers the basics of multinomial logistic regression.
    Write aproximately: 10 pages
    Add an introduction in the beggining of the section
    then get deeper and add some examples in python
    you have available the datasets: iris, titanic, tips, flights
    And the output should be a markdown file
